lead_paragraph: Leslie Deal and her brother Erin had bowled perfect games before, but not on the same night at the same bowling alley. That changed Tuesday when they both rolled 300’s in their final games within minutes of each other in Lima, Ohio. It was the seventh perfect game for Erin, 23, and the third for Leslie, 19.
